revision.text: {{Wired embedded system |brand=Sophos |model=RED |revision=15 Rev. 1 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |availability=EoL (08/31/2023) |est_release_date=09/2015 |pcb_id=4BQ00REDD1X10 |type=security appliance |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Freescale (NXP) |cpu1_model=P1010 |cpu1_cspeed=533 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S34ML01G200TFI00 |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B1G1646G-BCH9 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, console port,, RJ45,, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8211FS |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8367RB |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=3A Bus Termination Regulator;Fitipower;FP6137F;;1;,,, 3V RS232 Transceiver;Texas Instruments;MB3232I;;1;,,, Freescale P10XX System Clock w/Selectable DDR Frequency;Renesas;6V49205B;;1; |flags=metal case, heatsink |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.0.10;QorIQ-SKD-V1.6 |stock_os=Linux;3.10.49;OpenWrt Barrier Breaker; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |oui_eth=00:1A:8C }} {{TagLine|Sophos RED 15}} :[https://www.enterpriseav.com/datasheets/sophosreddsna.pdf Datasheet] * [https://docs.sophos.com/nsg/sophos-red/quickstart/en-us/sophosRED15_50oien.pdf Operating Instructions] "RED15 VER:D", "4BQ00REDD1X10" and "MADE IN TAIWAN" are silkscreened on both sides of the board. ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Freescale]]'' P1011 [[PowerPC]] (@533MHz) *Memory: 128MB (SDRAM) DDR3 *Storage: 128MB NAND Flash *Network: 5x Gigabit Ethernet ports *USB: 1x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 12V, 1.5A via barrel ==Images== ---- File:Sophos RED 15 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Sophos RED 15 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
